name: Class X509ExtendedKeyManager
text:
Abstract class that provides for extension of the X509KeyManager
 interface.
 
 Methods in this class should be overriden to provide actual
 implementations.
codes:
public abstract class X509ExtendedKeyManager
extends Object
implements X509KeyManager

methods.description:
Choose an alias to authenticate the client side of an
 SSLEngine connection given the public key type
 and the list of certificate issuer authorities recognized by
 the peer (if any).
 
 The default implementation returns null.

Choose an alias to authenticate the server side of an
 SSLEngine connection given the public key type
 and the list of certificate issuer authorities recognized by
 the peer (if any).
 
 The default implementation returns null.
